Package com.j2igf.framework.event

Class Input

java.lang.Object
com.j2igf.framework.event.Input
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener, EventListener
public final class Input extends Object implements KeyListener, MouseListener, MouseMotionListener, MouseWheelListener
This class is used to handle all the input events. It implements the following interfaces:
  • KeyListener
  • MouseListener
  • MouseMotionListener
  • MouseWheelListener
Author:
Aryan Rai
